nodes.text: Vansic's Scrap & Trade Market was a junk shop in the hidden township of Aurilia on Dathomir. It was run by the Mustafarian Vansic.

Vansic's Scrap & Trade Market was introduced into Star Wars Galaxies with Chapter 7 in November 2007, along with the rest of the new township of Aurilia. Like several other buildings in the city, it reuses the building model that was first used in Rage of the Wookiees as a hunting lodge for the Chiss Poachers in the Rodian Hunting Grounds on Kashyyyk. Star Wars Galaxies was shut down on December 15, 2011.
